Cet email concerne l’ajustement annuel de la perte d’exploitation pour l’exercice 2023 sur base de la déclaration  reçue de Madame Bellec datée du 10 Juin 2024.

Un chèque de 12 490.28€ vous sera transmis directement par Axa France.  

 

SVP, merci de me retourner en urgence les 2 avenants suivants signés + cachet  :Doc 1 et Doc 2 .

 

 

Dear all, 

This email concerns the annual adjustment of the operating loss for the financial year 2023 based on the declaration received from Mrs. Bellec dated June 10, 2024. 

 A check for €12,490.28 will be sent to you directly by Axa France

 

Urgent : Let us have the 2 addemdums doc1 and doc2 duly stamped and signed. 

All the best. 

 

Joe Nasr

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

Je comprends parfaitement votre m mécontentement tout à fait justifié  et encore une fois je m’en excuse et vous confirme que ceci est vraiment indépendant de ma volonté ; les équipes d’Axa ont été réorganisées ce qui engendré des retards sur le traitement des dossiers ,mais maintenant tout est à jour 

 

 

 

Absolutely Dear Mrs Batitni, I fully understand your completely justified dissatisfaction and once again I apologize and confirm that this is truly beyond my control; the Axa teams have been reorganized which caused delays in processing files, but now everything is up to date

 

The reply  to Mrs. Bellec's email was made by separate email.

Wish to all a nice end of Year holiday’s and waiting to hearing back from you

All thje best 

 

 

 

Joe Nasr

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions

Ce message provient d'un expéditeur externe - soyez prudent, en particulier avec les liens et les pièces jointes. 
This message is from an external sender - be cautious, particularly with links and attachments 

Chers tous,

Cet email concerne l’ajustement annuel de la perte d’exploitation pour l’exercice 2023 sur base de la déclaration  reçue de Madame Bellec datée du 10 Juin 2024.

Un chèque de 12 490.28€ vous sera transmis directement par Axa France.  

 

SVP, merci de me retourner en urgence les 2 avenants suivants signés + cachet  :Doc 1 et Doc 2 .

 

 

Dear all, 

This email concerns the annual adjustment of the operating loss for the financial year 2023 based on the declaration received from Mrs. Bellec dated June 10, 2024. 

 A check for €12,490.28 will be sent to you directly by Axa France

 

Urgent : Let us have the 2 addemdums doc1 and doc2 duly stamped and signed. 

All the best. 

 

Joe Nasr

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction. 

 

*and in respect of marine cargo cover, this is subject to ensuring the cargo is not subject to an export control restriction from the country of export to the destination country or to the receiving party and, ensuring the act of carrying the cargo will not in itself trigger a risk of being subject to sanctions.
